Revisions Tab

By default, the Revisions tab is at the front of the Revision pane. The Revisions tab lists all of the revisions associated with the selected versioned file. For each revision, the tab includes the revision number, the author of the revision, the date the revision was checked in, the users who have the revision locked, and the change description. You can also tell whether a revision is part of a branch, belongs to a promotion group, is locked, or has a version label assigned to it by looking at the icon.

The Revisions tab contains the following fields:

This field... Identifies the...
Revision Number assigned to the revision.
Author User ID of the person that made changes to the revision.
Date Checked InDate and time the revision was checked in.
Locked By User(s) holding a lock on the revision.
Change DescriptionDescription of the modifications contained in the revision.
